# Document Templates

Templates for creating consistent documentation in the Vixens project.

---

## Available Templates

- **[ADR Template](adr-template.md)**
  Template for Architecture Decision Records

- **[Application Doc Template](application-doc-template.md)**
  Template for documenting deployed applications

- **[Procedure Template](procedure-template.md)**
  Template for operational procedures

- **[Troubleshooting Template](troubleshooting-template.md)**
  Template for incident logs and troubleshooting guides

---

## Using Templates

1. Copy the appropriate template
2. Fill in all sections
3. Follow naming conventions (see [reference/naming-conventions.md](../reference/naming-conventions.md))
4. Add to appropriate directory
5. Update relevant README
